title: Somebody Has A Secret Admirer
itunes:title: Somebody Has A Secret Admirer
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I really need your advice for this issue I’m having. I have fallen for someone that I have never met in person. I have heard him speak almost everyday and I'm not sure if he is single, but I would love to meet him in person. I am single and ready to mingle with him if he is available. This guy makes my toes curl when I hear his voice and the icing on the cake is that he is very funny and quite handsome. I have been single and abstinent for five years by choice. I have been focusing on my daughters and I’m writing a book about my family and it will be coming out soon...........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
